Uses of Class
org.netbeans.api.search.provider.SearchFilter

  • Packages that use SearchFilter 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.search
    This package contains classes that can be used by modules that need to work with Search in Projects dialog, or want to share information about what data was recently searched.
    org.netbeans.api.search.provider
    Classes that you may need to work with if you are implementing a custom search provider.

    • Uses of SearchFilter in org.netbeans.api.search

      Get list of filters.

      Constructor and Description
      SearchRoot(FileObject rootFile, List<SearchFilter> filters)
      Create a new search root, defined by a folder and a set of filters.
      SearchRoot(URI rootUri, List<SearchFilter> filters)
      Create a new search root, defined by a folder and a set of filters.
